seamlessly to integrate into your AWS

ingest data from multiple AWS sources
including Amazon S3 Amazon ECR Amazon
EC2 Amazon EKS and ROSA We bring the

analytics engine This layer processes

correlating risks dependencies and
performance trends From there we
visualize and understand uh the data
that we ingest and we action on it
Concert presents insights via intuitive

automates remediation workflows using

Service Now and GitHub That is great
charge How does Concert integrate with

how does this solve hybrid use cases
where you have customers running

and hybrid cloud comp uh compatibility
Concert leverages AWS services like

Concert helps organizations identify

AIdriven insights using

Lastly we automate remediation through
